fromHighlands: From the highlands of Yirgacheffe to the fertile lands of Wollega, we bring Ethiopia's finest harvests to the world.

exportingHighGrade: Exporting high-grade green Arabica coffee beans from Ethiopia's renowned coffee regions.

exploreRichCultural: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Ethiopia's coffee ceremony, a symbol of community and respect, and learn why it's more than just a drink.
fromYirgacheffeToSidamo: From Yirgacheffe to Sidamo: Ethiopia's Coffee Regions
discoverWhatMakes: Discover what makes each Ethiopian coffee region unique, from the floral notes of Yirgacheffe to the fruity flavors of Sidamo.

aTrustedExporter: A trusted exporter and service provider specializing in agricultural commodities and engineering solutions from Ethiopia to the world.
nahoragriIsTrusted: NAHORagri is a trusted exporter and service provider specializing in agricultural commodities and engineering solutions. Headquartered in Addis Ababa, we leverage Ethiopia's rich natural resources and our global partnerships to serve clients across five continents.
toDeliverExceptional: To deliver exceptional agro and engineering services tailored to the evolving needs of our clients with a focus on sustainability and customer satisfaction.
toBecomeEast: To become East Africa's leading exporter of agricultural goods and a top provider of integrated engineering solutions.
atNAHORagri: At NAHORagri, our values guide everything we do, from sourcing the finest agricultural products to delivering exceptional engineering solutions.
weMaintainHighest: We maintain the highest standards in all our products and services, ensuring that our clients receive only the best.
weContinuouslySeek: We continuously seek new and better ways to serve our clients, embracing technological advancements and creative solutions.
ourClientsCanDepend: Our clients can depend on us to deliver on our promises, consistently and on time, building trust through every interaction.
weAreCommitted: We are committed to environmentally responsible practices that preserve resources for future generations.
wePrioritizeUnderstanding: We prioritize understanding and meeting our clients' needs, building long-term relationships based on mutual success.
weConductOurBusiness: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards that exceed industry expectations.
withStrategicPartnerships: With strategic partnerships, a strong export track record, and an unwavering focus on quality, we deliver exceptional products and services.
rigorousQualityControl: Rigorous quality control at every stage
flexibleSolutions: Flexible solutions to meet client needs
getInTouchWithTeam: Get in touch with our team to discuss your specific requirements and discover how NAHORagri can meet your needs.
forAllInquiries: For all inquiries, please use the contact information or map below. We look forward to hearing from you!
findAnswersToCommon: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and business processes.
ourMinimumOrder: Our minimum order quantity is 1 Full Container Load (FCL). However, we can discuss smaller quantities for first-time orders or samples.
shippingTimesVary: Shipping times vary depending on the destination. Typically, it takes 2-4 weeks from the Port of Djibouti to most international destinations.
yesWeProvide: Yes, we provide samples upon request. Sample costs and shipping fees may apply, which can be credited against your first order.
wePrimarilyWork: We primarily work with 100% Confirmed Letter of Credit (LC) at Sight. For established clients, we may consider other payment methods.
contactTeamToday: Contact our team today to learn more about our products and services, and discover how we can help you achieve your goals.
contactTeamTodayDiscuss: Contact our team today to discuss your specific requirements and discover how NAHORagri can meet your agricultural and engineering needs.
contactTeamTodayQuote: Contact our team today to discuss your specific requirements and get a personalized quote for our products and services.
exploreProductsServices: Explore our range of high-quality agricultural commodities and engineering solutions, sourced from Ethiopia's rich natural resources.
weExportHighGrade: We export high-grade Green Arabica Coffee Beans sourced from Ethiopia's renowned coffee regions, known for their exceptional quality and distinctive flavor profiles.
discoverOurRange: Discover our range of premium Ethiopian sesame seeds and value-added products, known for their quality and versatility in global markets.
weExportPremium: We export premium Humera and Wollega sesame seeds, renowned for their high oil content, purity, and excellent flavor. Our sesame seeds are carefully sourced, cleaned, and packed to meet international standards.
organicallyGrownAvocados: Organically grown avocados sourced from Ethiopian highlands, processed in modern facilities with strict quality control measures.
freshOrganicallyGrown: Fresh, organically grown avocados from the Ethiopian highlands, known for their creamy texture and rich flavor.
purePreservativeFree: Pure, preservative-free avocado paste, perfect for food service, retail, and industrial applications.
premiumColdPressed: Premium cold-pressed avocado oil, extracted using state-of-the-art technology to preserve nutrients and flavor.
richOleicAcid: Rich in oleic acid and vitamins
ourAvocadoProducts: Our avocado products are processed in modern facilities located in Yirgalem and Jimma, equipped with the latest technology to ensure product quality and safety.
specializesFreshPacking: Specializes in fresh packing and paste production
nahoragriPartners: NAHORagri partners with global manufacturers to deliver reliable engineering solutions tailored to Africa's growing infrastructural needs.
weProvideComprehensive: We provide comprehensive agricultural engineering solutions to enhance productivity and efficiency in farming operations.
ourIndustrialEngineering: Our industrial engineering services help businesses optimize their operations and improve efficiency.
weContributeTo: We contribute to Africa's infrastructure development through innovative engineering solutions.
ourTeamExperienced: Our team of experienced engineers provides expert consulting services across various technical domains.
weCollaborateWith: We collaborate with leading global manufacturers and engineering firms to deliver the best solutions to our clients.
weEnsureProducts: We ensure that our products are properly packaged and delivered to your destination with efficiency and care.
weOfferFlexible: We offer flexible payment options to facilitate smooth business transactions.
confirmedLetterCredit: 100% Confirmed Letter of Credit (LC) at Sight

humeraSesame.name: Humera Sesame
humeraSesame.short: Humera type of sesame, which is known to be a premium variety. Native to the Humera district in northwest Ethiopia. Whitish Humera type is known for its top quality and has a bid demand in the world market.
humeraSesame.detail: Humera sesame is highly valued for its purity, color, and oil content. It is widely used in international markets for tahini and oil extraction.

isYourPremierGlobalSource: is your premier global source for high-quality agricultural commodities and engineering solutions.
europeCountries: Germany, Italy, UK, Belgium, Spain, France
asiaCountries: South Korea, India, Japan, China, Taiwan

lekempti.name: LEKEMPTI
lekempti.short: Smooth acidity, balance, and delicate fruit flavors. Cultivated in Welega, west of Addis Ababa.
lekempti.detail: Lekempti coffee is appreciated for its smoother acidity, balance, and delicate fruit flavors. It is primarily cultivated in Welega, a province to the west of Addis Ababa, where coffee is mostly grown in forest or semi-forest land and naturally processed.

djimmah.name: DJIMMAH
djimmah.short: Excellent, low-acid coffee from Illubabor and Kaffa regions.
djimmah.detail: An excellent, low-acid Ethiopian coffee. Djimmah coffee is grown in the Illubabor and Kaffa regions of Ethiopia at elevations within the biggest catchment area in Ethiopia.

yirgacheffe.name: YIRGACHEFFE
yirgacheffe.short: World-renowned, fruit-forward flavor from southern Ethiopia.
yirgacheffe.detail: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee is considered one of the best coffees in the world. It comes from the town of Yirgacheffe in southern Ethiopia. The variety, terroir, and processing method create an organic coffee with a fruit-forward flavor that is sought by many coffee lovers.

sidamo.name: SIDAMO
sidamo.detail: Sidamo coffee is known for its citrus, lemongrass, pineapple, and blueberry notes. Grown in southern Ethiopia, it is prized for its complex flavor and bright acidity.

guji.name: GUJI
guji.short: Jasmine, lemon, honey, berry, silky body.
guji.detail: Guji coffee offers jasmine, lemon, honey, and berry notes with a silky body. It is grown in the Guji zone, a region celebrated for its unique microclimate and rich soils.

limmu.name: LIMMU
limmu.short: Fruity, winey, smooth with low acidity.
limmu.detail: Limmu coffee is fruity, winey, and smooth with low acidity. It is grown in the western highlands of Ethiopia and is known for its clean cup and pleasant aftertaste.

benchmaji.name: BENCHMAJI
benchmaji.short: Exotic, bold, spicy and winey complexity.
benchmaji.detail: Benchmaji coffee is exotic, bold, and offers spicy and winey complexity. It is produced in the Bench Maji zone, a region with diverse altitudes and climates.

chatbot.title: NAHORagri Chatbot
chatbot.welcome: Hello! How can I help you today?
chatbot.greeting: Hi there! 👋 How can I assist you?
chatbot.products: We offer coffee, sesame seeds, avocado products, and engineering solutions. What would you like to know more about?
chatbot.contact: You can reach us via the contact page. Would you like the link?
chatbot.thanks: You're welcome! If you have more questions, just ask.
chatbot.default: I'm here to help! Please ask me anything about our products or services.

faq.a: We offer Ethiopian coffee, sesame seeds, avocado products, and engineering solutions.
You can contact us via the contact page or by email at info@nahoragri.com.
We are based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, and serve clients worldwide.
Yes, we export our products to Europe, Asia, North America, the Middle East, and Africa.

faq.q: How can I request a quote?
faq.a: You can request a quote by visiting our contact page and filling out the form.

faq.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a: We accept bank transfers and other secure payment methods. Please contact us for details.
Shipping times depend on the destination. We will provide an estimated delivery time with your order confirmation.
Yes, samples are available upon request. Please contact us for more information.
Yes, we offer technical support for our engineering solutions and products.

faq.q: How do I switch the website language?
faq.a: You can switch languages using the language selector at the top of the page.
